title: Mass General Kiosk
description: In a team of 11, we applied the agile scrum methodology to create a kiosk app to handle pathfinding and service requests. I led the frontend team as assistant lead software developer working with functionality, authentication, and UI.

title: Pan Asian Festival App
description: This is a project was made during a hackathon in a group of 5, where we decided to make an app that would help reduce the wait time for people getting food. I worked mainly on the backend getting the database to work on firebase while using flask, allowing consistent data management and processing.

title: Project C
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.
